title: DiffMoog: a Differentiable Modular Synthesizer for Sound Matching. (arXiv:2401.12570v1 [eess.AS])
abstract: This paper presents DiffMoog - a differentiable modular synthesizer with a comprehensive set of modules typically found in commercial instruments. Being differentiable, it allows integration into neural networks, enabling automated sound matching, to replicate a given audio input. Notably, DiffMoog facilitates modulation capabilities (FM/AM), low-frequency oscillators (LFOs), filters, envelope shapers, and the ability for users to create custom signal chains. We introduce an open-source platform that comprises DiffMoog and an end-to-end sound matching framework. This framework utilizes a novel signal-chain loss and an encoder network that self-programs its outputs to predict DiffMoogs parameters based on the user-defined modular architecture. Moreover, we provide insights and lessons learned towards sound matching using differentiable synthesis. Combining robust sound capabilities with a holistic platform, DiffMoog stands as a premier asset for expediting research in audio synthesis an

translated_title: DiffMoog: 一个可微分的模块化合成器用于声音匹配
translated_abstract: 本文介绍了DiffMoog - 一个具有商业乐器中常见模块的可微分模块化合成器。作为可微分的，它可以集成到神经网络中，实现自动化的声音匹配，以复制给定的音频输入。值得注意的是，DiffMoog具有调制能力（FM / AM）、低频振荡器（LFOs）、滤波器、包络形状器以及用户创建自定义信号链的能力。我们介绍了一个开源平台，该平台包括了DiffMoog和端到端的声音匹配框架。该框架利用了一种新颖的信号链损失和一个编码器网络，该网络根据用户定义的模块化架构来自动编程其输出，以预测DiffMoog的参数。此外，我们还提供了使用可微分合成进行声音匹配的见解和经验教训。通过将强大的声音功能与全面的平台结合，DiffMoog成为加快音频合成研究的首选资产。
tldr: DiffMoog是一个可微分的模块化合成器，可以集成到神经网络中，实现自动化的声音匹配。它具有调制能力、低频振荡器、滤波器和包络形状器等功能，并且用户可以创建自定义信号链。该研究还提出了一个基于信号链损失和编码器网络的端到端声音匹配框架，为使用可微分合成进行声音匹配的研究提供了见解和经验教训。
en_tdlr: DiffMoog is a differentiable modular synthesizer that can be integrated into neural networks for automated sound matching. It offers modulation capabilities, low-frequency oscillators, filters, and envelope shapers, as well as the ability to create custom signal chains. The paper also introduces an end-to-end sound matching framework using a signal-chain loss and an encoder network, providing insights and lessons learned for sound matching using differentiable synthesis.
